poem:
"Eastern Playhouse"

The eagle of the east, aloft to meet
the stolid bear in histrionic North.
An estranged dialogue will find a beat
on Pyongyang's stage, a fervent pact set forth. 

Indifference to norms, a defiant waltz
draped in the shadow of a distant war.
In this secluded theater, who defaults?
Stark players, they dance to settle a score.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. In his first visit to North Korea since 2000, Putin will meet Kim Jong-un for one-on-one talks in Pyongyang as the two leaders pledge to expand their security and economic cooperation in defiance of". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
